title: Independent candidate Sher Ali Afridi wins PK-77 election
content:
ISLAMABAD, Feb 9 (APP): Independent candidate Sher Ali Afridi has won the Khyber Pakhtunkhwa Assembly election from PK-77 Peshawar-VI by securing 30,544 votes.
According to the unofficial result issued by the Returning Officer/ECP, his runner-up was JUI-P’s candidate Sifatullah, who bagged 7,615 votes.
Overall voters’ turn-out remained 32.4 percent.
